title: SHINOBI WAY: Jutsus Revamp
description: Comprehensive jutsu/skill system balance pass, damage formula polish, and skill progression normalization for the roguelike dungeon crawler.
goal: Balance the 62-skill system for fair progression, strategic depth, and satisfying combat.

features.name: Skill Balance Review & Audit
features.notes: Audit all 62 skills across 5 tiers. Key file: src/game/constants/index.ts (lines 151-968)

subfeatures.name: Audit damage multipliers by tier
subfeatures.notes: Review damageMult values: COMMON (1.8-2.5), RARE (2.5-3.5), EPIC (3.5-5.0), LEGENDARY (5.0-6.0), FORBIDDEN (6.0-7.0). Recent patch buffed all skills ~40-50%.

subfeatures.name: Review chakra cost distribution
subfeatures.notes: Current range: 0 (Taijutsu) to 150 (Tengai Shinsei). Check cost-to-damage ratios are consistent.

subfeatures.name: Normalize cooldown system
subfeatures.notes: Issue: Taijutsu has NO cooldown while similar skills have 2-3 turns. Consider adding 1-turn cooldown to basic attacks or reducing specialty skill cooldowns.

features.name: Damage System Polish
features.notes: Address TRUE damage bypass, penetration underuse, and armor break balance. Key file: src/game/systems/StatSystem.ts

subfeatures.name: Rebalance TRUE damage type
subfeatures.notes: 6 skills use TRUE damage (bypasses ALL defense). Consider: partial defense penetration (50%) instead of full bypass, or add significant cooldown/cost penalties.

subfeatures.name: Expand penetration mechanic usage
subfeatures.notes: Only Chidori has penetration (0.2). Add to more precision-based skills: Gentle Fist, Shuriken, Ranged jutsu. Values: 0.1-0.3 range.

subfeatures.name: Tune ARMOR_BREAK property
subfeatures.notes: Kirin (7.0x + ARMOR_BREAK) is devastating. Consider reducing multiplier or changing to PIERCING. Sand Coffin (4.0x) is more balanced.

subfeatures.name: Review damage type distribution
subfeatures.notes: Current: PHYSICAL (18), ELEMENTAL (28), MENTAL (10), TRUE (6). Mental skills underperform in DPS - consider buffing mental damage multipliers.

features.name: Skill Requirements Normalization
features.notes: Smooth skill progression curve. Current INT ceiling too high (28 for Tengai Shinsei).

subfeatures.name: Lower INT requirement ceiling
subfeatures.notes: Reduce max INT requirement from 28 to 22. Skills to adjust: Tengai Shinsei (28->22), Tsukuyomi (24->20), Kamui (22->18).

subfeatures.name: Align requirements with skill tiers
subfeatures.notes: Proposed ranges: COMMON (0-8), RARE (8-12), EPIC (12-16), LEGENDARY (16-20), FORBIDDEN (18-22). Remove clustering at 18+ INT.

subfeatures.name: Review clan-specific requirements
subfeatures.notes: Ensure clan restrictions are meaningful: Uchiha-only skills (Tsukuyomi, Sharingan), Hyuga-only (Rotation, Byakugan). Balance clan power curves.

features.name: Effect System Enhancement
features.notes: Expand status effects and add strategic value to HP-cost skills.

subfeatures.name: Add strategic value to HP-cost skills
subfeatures.notes: Current HP-cost skills feel arbitrary: Primary Lotus (25 HP), Tsukuyomi (15 HP), Bone Drill (10 HP). Add bonus effects proportional to HP spent.

subfeatures.name: Balance toggle skill upkeep costs
subfeatures.notes: Sharingan and Byakugan both have 5 CP/turn upkeep - too cheap for permanent buffs. Consider 8-10 CP/turn or scaling with effect duration.

subfeatures.name: Expand status effect variety
subfeatures.notes: Current effects: STUN, BURN, POISON, BLEED, SHIELD, BUFF/DEBUFF, CONFUSION, REFLECTION. Consider adding: SLOW (speed debuff), SEAL (prevents jutsu), DRAIN (chakra steal).

features.name: Element Balance & Diversity
features.notes: Address fire over-representation and expand other elements. Element cycle: Fire > Wind > Lightning > Earth > Water > Fire

subfeatures.name: Reduce fire element over-representation
subfeatures.notes: 6+ fire skills vs 3-4 for other elements. Consider converting some to other elements or adding new non-fire skills.

subfeatures.name: Expand Earth and Wind skill pools
subfeatures.notes: Earth: only Mud Wall, Sand Coffin. Wind: few options. Add 2-3 skills per element for variety.

subfeatures.name: Tune elemental effectiveness bonuses
subfeatures.notes: Super effective: +20% crit, ignores 50% of % defense. Consider if these bonuses are too strong or weak for strategic play.

features.name: Testing & Validation
features.notes: Run battle simulations and manual tests to validate balance changes.

subfeatures.name: Run battle simulation suite
subfeatures.notes: Use npm run simulate and npm run simulate:quick to test balance. Check win rates, average damage, skill usage distribution.

subfeatures.name: Manual playtest all skill tiers
subfeatures.notes: Test each clan through floors 1-10. Verify skill progression feels smooth. Check for overpowered/underpowered skills.

subfeatures.name: Polish skill UI display
subfeatures.notes: Verify SkillCard.tsx displays accurate damage predictions, cooldowns, and costs. Check tooltip information completeness.
